TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EventWaitHandle extends System.Threading.WaitHandle

span.span: Represents a thread synchronization event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可讓執行緒信號與對方進行通訊。The class allows threads to communicate with each other by signaling. 一般而言，一個或多個執行緒封鎖之前解除封鎖的執行緒呼叫方法，釋出一或多個已封鎖的執行緒。Typically, one or more threads block on an until an unblocked thread calls the method, releasing one or more of the blocked threads. 執行緒可以發出信號再封鎖它，藉由呼叫`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)方法。A thread can signal an and then block on it, by calling the `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method. > [!NOTE] > 類別會提供存取具名的系統同步處理事件。The class provides access to named system synchronization events. 行為，已收到信號其重設模式而定。The behavior of an that has been signaled depends on its reset mode. 以建立旗標會自動重設時收到信號之後釋出單一的等候執行緒。An created with the flag resets automatically when signaled, after releasing a single waiting thread. 以建立旗標會保留已收到信號，直到其方法呼叫。An created with the flag remains signaled until its method is called. 自動重設事件提供給資源的獨佔存取權。Automatic reset events provide exclusive access to a resource. 如果自動重設事件在沒有任何執行緒處於等候狀態時收到訊號，它會維持收到訊號的狀態，直到有執行緒嘗試等候它為止。If an automatic reset event is signaled when no threads are waiting, it remains signaled until a thread attempts to wait on it. 此事件會釋出執行緒並立即重設，以阻斷後續的執行緒。The event releases the thread and immediately resets, blocking subsequent threads. 手動重設事件就像是大門。Manual reset events are like gates. 當事件不會收到信號時，將會封鎖在其等候的執行緒。When the event is not signaled, threads that wait on it will block. 當事件發出信號、 釋放所有等候中執行緒，以及事件保留已收到信號時 （亦即，就不會封鎖後續的等候） 直到其方法呼叫。When the event is signaled, all waiting threads are released, and the event remains signaled (that is, subsequent waits do not block) until its method is called. 手動重設事件當一個執行緒必須完成的活動，然後才可以繼續執行其他執行緒會很有用。Manual reset events are useful when one thread must complete an activity before other threads can proceed. 物件可以用與`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)和方法。 objects can be used with the `static`(`Shared` in Visual Basic) and methods. 如需執行緒的同步處理機制的詳細資訊，請參閱[EventWaitHandle、 AutoResetEvent、 CountdownEvent、 ManualResetEvent](~/docs/standard/threading/eventwaithandle-autoresetevent-countdownevent-manualresetevent.md)。For more information about thread synchronization mechanisms, see [EventWaitHandle, AutoResetEvent, CountdownEvent, ManualResetEvent](~/docs/standard/threading/eventwaithandle-autoresetevent-countdownevent-manualresetevent.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法多載來允許主執行緒發出信號封鎖的執行緒，以及執行緒完成工作，然後等候。The following code example uses the method overload to allow the main thread to signal a blocked thread and then wait until the thread finishes a task. 範例啟動五個執行緒，並讓他們封鎖以建立旗標，然後再發行每一個執行緒時間，使用者按下 ENTER 鍵。The example starts five threads and allows them to block on an created with the flag, then releases one thread each time the user presses the ENTER key. 此範例會排入佇列，另一個的五個執行緒，並釋放所有使用以建立旗標。The example then queues another five threads and releases them all using an created with the flag. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: This type is thread safe.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying whether the wait handle is initially signaled, and whether it resets automatically or manually.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未收到信號的事件初始狀態，該事件的執行緒會封鎖。If the initial state of the event is nonsignaled, threads that wait on the event will block. 如果收到信號的初始狀態，而旗標指定給`mode`，該事件的執行緒不會封鎖。If the initial state is signaled, and the flag is specified for `mode`, threads that wait on the event will not block. 如果收到信號的初始狀態，和`mode`是、 等候事件的第一個執行緒就會發行立即之後, 會重設事件，並將會封鎖後續的執行緒。If the initial state is signaled, and `mode` is , the first thread that waits on the event will be released immediately, after which the event will reset, and subsequent threads will block. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法多載來允許主執行緒發出信號封鎖的執行緒，以及執行緒完成工作，然後等候。The following code example uses the method overload to allow the main thread to signal a blocked thread and then wait until the thread finishes a task. 範例啟動五個執行緒，並讓他們封鎖以建立旗標，然後再發行每一個執行緒時間，使用者按下 ENTER 鍵。The example starts five threads and allows them to block on an created with the flag, then releases one thread each time the user presses ENTER key. 此範例會排入佇列，另一個的五個執行緒，並釋放所有使用以建立旗標。The example then queues another five threads and releases them all using an created with the flag. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying whether the wait handle is initially signaled if created as a result of this call, whether it resets automatically or manually, and the name of a system synchronization event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`name`是`null`或空字串時，本機建立。If `name` is `null` or an empty string, a local is created. 如果指定的名稱與系統事件`name`參數已經存在，`initialState`參數已忽略。If a system event with the name specified for the `name` parameter already exists, the `initialState` parameter is ignored. > [!IMPORTANT] > 當使用這個建構函式的具名的系統事件時，指定`false`如`initialState`。When using this constructor for named system events, specify `false` for `initialState`. 這個建構函式會提供任何方法來判斷是否已建立具名的系統事件，因此您不能提出任何假設具名事件的狀態。This constructor provides no way to determine whether a named system event was created, so you cannot make any assumptions about the state of the named event. 若要判斷是否已建立的具名的事件，請使用建構函式或建構函式。To determine whether a named event was created, use the constructor or the constructor. 如果未收到信號的事件初始狀態，該事件的執行緒會封鎖。If the initial state of the event is nonsignaled, threads that wait on the event will block. 如果收到信號的初始狀態，而旗標指定給`mode`，該事件的執行緒不會封鎖。If the initial state is signaled, and the flag is specified for `mode`, threads that wait on the event will not block. 如果收到信號的初始狀態，和`mode`是、 等候事件的第一個執行緒就會發行立即之後, 會重設事件，並將會封鎖後續的執行緒。If the initial state is signaled, and `mode` is , the first thread that waits on the event will be released immediately, after which the event will reset, and subsequent threads will block.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的名稱與系統事件`name`參數已經存在，`initialState`參數已忽略。If a system event with the name specified for the `name` parameter already exists, the `initialState` parameter is ignored. 之後呼叫這個建構函式，使用中針對指定的變數值`ref`參數 (`ByRef`在 Visual Basic 中)`createdNew`來判斷是否具名的系統事件已經存在，或已建立。After calling this constructor, use the value in the variable specified for the `ref` parameter (`ByRef` parameter in Visual Basic)`createdNew` to determine whether the named system event already existed or was created. 如果未收到信號的事件初始狀態，該事件的執行緒會封鎖。If the initial state of the event is nonsignaled, threads that wait on the event will block. 如果收到信號的初始狀態，而旗標指定給`mode`，該事件的執行緒不會封鎖。If the initial state is signaled, and the flag is specified for `mode`, threads that wait on the event will not block. 如果收到信號的初始狀態，和`mode`是、 等候事件的第一個執行緒就會發行立即之後, 會重設事件，並將會封鎖後續的執行緒。If the initial state is signaled, and `mode` is , the first thread that waits on the event will be released immediately, after which the event will reset, and subsequent threads will block.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying whether the wait handle is initially signaled if created as a result of this call, whether it resets automatically or manually, the name of a system synchronization event, a Boolean variable whose value after the call indicates whether the named system event was created, and the access control security to be applied to the named event if it is created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個建構函式套用到具名的系統事件建立時，避免其他程式碼取得事件的控制項的存取控制安全性。Use this constructor to apply access control security to a named system event when it is created, preventing other code from taking control of the event. 這個建構函式初始化物件，代表系統事件。This constructor initializes an object that represents a system event. 您可以建立多個代表相同的系統事件的物件。You can create multiple objects that represent the same system event. 如果系統事件不存在，則會建立具有指定的存取控制安全性。If the system event does not exist, it is created with the specified access control security. 如果此事件存在，則會忽略指定的存取控制安全性。If the event exists, the specified access control security is ignored. > [!NOTE] > 呼叫端具有對於新建立的完整控制權物件，即使`eventSecurity`拒絕，或將某些存取權授與目前的使用者就會失敗。The caller has full control over the newly created object even if `eventSecurity` denies or fails to grant some access rights to the current user. 不過，如果目前的使用者試圖取得另一個物件代表相同具名事件時，使用建構函式或方法時，Windows 會套用存取控制安全性。However, if the current user attempts to get another object to represent the same named event, using either a constructor or the method, Windows access control security is applied. 如果指定的名稱與系統事件`name`參數已經存在，`initialState`參數已忽略。If a system event with the name specified for the `name` parameter already exists, the `initialState` parameter is ignored. 之後呼叫這個建構函式，使用中針對指定的變數值`ref`參數 (`ByRef`在 Visual Basic 中)`createdNew`來判斷是否具名的系統事件已經存在，或已建立。After calling this constructor, use the value in the variable specified for the `ref` parameter (`ByRef` parameter in Visual Basic) `createdNew` to determine whether the named system event already existed or was created. 如果未收到信號的事件初始狀態，該事件的執行緒會封鎖。If the initial state of the event is nonsignaled, threads that wait on the event will block. 如果收到信號的初始狀態，而旗標指定給`mode`，該事件的執行緒不會封鎖。If the initial state is signaled, and the flag is specified for `mode`, threads that wait on the event will not block. 如果收到信號的初始狀態，和`mode`是、 等候事件的第一個執行緒就會發行立即之後, 會重設事件，並將會封鎖後續的執行緒。If the initial state is signaled, and `mode` is , the first thread that waits on the event will be released immediately, after which the event will reset, and subsequent threads will block. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範具名的系統事件的跨處理序行為與存取控制安全性。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named system event with access control security. 此範例會使用方法多載來測試是否存在的具名事件。The example uses the method overload to test for the existence of a named event. 如果事件不存在，就會建立使用的初始擁有權和拒絕目前使用者的權限，請使用事件，但讀取和變更的權限事件的權限會授與存取控制安全性。If the event does not exist, it is created with initial ownership and access control security that denies the current user the right to use the event, but grants the right to read and change permissions on the event. 如果您從兩個命令視窗執行編譯的範例，第二個副本將會擲回存取違規的例外狀況上呼叫。If you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will throw an access violation exception on the call to . 例外狀況時，和此範例會使用方法多載來讀取和變更的權限所需的權限以等候事件。The exception is caught, and the example uses the method overload to wait on the event with the rights needed to read and change the permissions. 變更權限之後，事件會開啟在其上等候，並表示它所需的權限。After the permissions are changed, the event is opened with the rights required to wait on it and signal it. 如果您是從第三個命令視窗執行編譯的範例，此範例會使用執行新的權限。If you run the compiled example from a third command window, the example runs using the new permissions. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會使用下列旗標 （使用位元 OR 運算結合） 的組合來搜尋權限： ， ，和。The method uses the following combination of flags (combined using the bitwise OR operation) to search for permissions: , , and . 使用者必須擁有呼叫這個方法和事件的權限必須是與開啟旗標。The user must have rights to call this method, and the event must have been opened with the flag. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範具名的系統事件的跨處理序行為與存取控制安全性。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named system event with access control security. 此範例會使用方法多載來測試是否存在的具名事件。The example uses the method overload to test for the existence of a named event. 如果事件不存在，就會建立使用的初始擁有權和拒絕目前使用者的權限，請使用事件，但讀取和變更的權限事件的權限會授與存取控制安全性。If the event does not exist, it is created with initial ownership and access control security that denies the current user the right to use the event, but grants the right to read and change permissions on the event. 如果您從兩個命令視窗執行編譯的範例，第二個副本將會擲回存取違規的例外狀況上呼叫。If you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will throw an access violation exception on the call to . 例外狀況時，和此範例會使用方法多載來讀取和變更的權限所需的權限以等候事件。The exception is caught, and the example uses the method overload to wait on the event with the rights needed to read and change the permissions. 權限已閱讀、 使用之後方法，而且變更，事件會開啟在其上等候，並表示它所需的權限。After the permissions have been read, using the method, and changed, the event is opened with the rights required to wait on it and signal it. 如果您是從第三個命令視窗執行編譯的範例，此範例會使用執行新的權限。If you run the compiled example from a third command window, the example runs using the new permissions. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法嘗試開啟指定的具名的系統事件。The method tries to open the specified named system event. 如果系統事件不存在，這個方法會擲回的例外狀況，而不是建立的系統事件。If the system event does not exist, this method throws an exception instead of creating the system event. 若要建立的系統事件不存在時，使用其中一種建構函式具有`name`參數。To create the system event when it does not already exist, use one of the constructors that has a `name` parameter. 使用相同的值，這個方法的多次呼叫`name`不一定會傳回相同物件，即使傳回的物件代表相同的具名的系統事件。Multiple calls to this method that use the same value for `name` do not necessarily return the same object, even though the objects that are returned represent the same named system event. 這個方法多載就相當於呼叫方法多載，並指定和權限，使用位元 OR 運算結合。This method overload is equivalent to calling the method overload and specifying and rights, combined by using the bitwise OR operation. 指定旗標可讓執行緒等候該具名的系統事件，並指定旗標可讓呼叫執行緒和方法。Specifying the flag allows a thread to wait on the named system event, and specifying the flag allows a thread to call the and methods. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範具名的系統事件的跨處理序行為與存取控制安全性。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named system event with access control security. 此範例會使用方法多載來測試是否存在的具名事件。The example uses the method overload to test for the existence of a named event. 如果事件不存在，就會建立使用的初始擁有權和拒絕目前使用者的權限，請使用事件，但讀取和變更的權限事件的權限會授與存取控制安全性。If the event does not exist, it is created with initial ownership and access control security that denies the current user the right to use the event, but grants the right to read and change permissions on the event. 如果您從兩個命令視窗執行編譯的範例，第二個副本將會擲回存取違規的例外狀況上呼叫。If you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will throw an access violation exception on the call to . 例外狀況時，和此範例會使用方法多載來讀取和變更的權限所需的權限以等候事件。The exception is caught, and the example uses the method overload to wait on the event with the rights needed to read and change the permissions. 變更權限之後，事件會開啟在其上等候，並表示它所需的權限。After the permissions are changed, the event is opened with the rights required to wait on it and signal it. 如果您是從第三個命令視窗執行編譯的範例，此範例會使用執行新的權限。If you run the compiled example from a third command window, the example runs using the new permissions. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `rights`參數必須包含旗標以允許的執行緒等待事件，而旗標以允許呼叫的執行緒和方法。The `rights` parameter must include the flag to allow threads to wait on the event, and the flag to allow threads to call the and methods. 方法嘗試開啟現有的具名的系統事件。The method tries to open an existing named system event. 如果系統事件不存在，這個方法會擲回的例外狀況，而不是建立的系統事件。If the system event does not exist, this method throws an exception instead of creating the system event. 若要建立的系統事件不存在時，使用其中一種建構函式具有`name`參數。To create the system event when it does not already exist, use one of the constructors that has a `name` parameter. 使用相同的值，這個方法的多次呼叫`name`不一定會傳回相同物件，即使傳回的物件代表相同的具名的系統事件。Multiple calls to this method that use the same value for `name` do not necessarily return the same object, even though the objects that are returned represent the same named system event. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範具名的系統事件的跨處理序行為與存取控制安全性。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named system event with access control security. 此範例會使用方法多載來測試是否存在的具名事件。The example uses the method overload to test for the existence of a named event. 如果事件不存在，就會建立使用的初始擁有權和拒絕目前使用者的權限，請使用事件，但讀取和變更的權限事件的權限會授與存取控制安全性。If the event does not exist, it is created with initial ownership and access control security that denies the current user the right to use the event, but grants the right to read and change permissions on the event. 如果您從兩個命令視窗執行編譯的範例，第二個副本將會擲回存取違規的例外狀況上呼叫。If you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will throw an access violation exception on the call to . 例外狀況時，和此範例會使用方法多載來讀取和變更的權限所需的權限以等候事件。The exception is caught, and the example uses the method overload to wait on the event with the rights needed to read and change the permissions. 變更權限之後，事件會開啟在其上等候，並表示它所需的權限。After the permissions are changed, the event is opened with the rights required to wait on it and signal it. 如果您是從第三個命令視窗執行編譯的範例，此範例會使用執行新的權限。If you run the compiled example from a third command window, the example runs using the new permissions. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如與(包括)、方法會釋放單一執行緒。For an with (including ), the method releases a single thread. 如果有任何的等候中執行緒，等候控制代碼維持信號，直到執行緒嘗試等候，或直到它方法呼叫。If there are no waiting threads, the wait handle remains signaled until a thread attempts to wait on it, or until its method is called. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不保證，每次呼叫方法會釋放執行緒其重設模式是。There is no guarantee that every call to the method will release a thread from an whose reset mode is . 如果兩個呼叫太接近，使第二次呼叫發生於之前已釋放執行緒，只有一個執行緒在釋出。If two calls are too close together, so that the second call occurs before a thread has been released, only one thread is released. 就如同第二個呼叫並未發生。It is as if the second call did not happen. 此外，如果沒有等候的執行緒時，會呼叫和已經發出信號，呼叫沒有任何作用。Also, if is called when there are no threads waiting and the is already signaled, the call has no effect. 如與(包括)，則呼叫方法會等候控制代碼保留在收到信號的狀態，直到其方法呼叫。For an with (including ), calling the method leaves the wait handle in a signaled state until its method is called. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法多載來允許主執行緒發出信號封鎖的執行緒，以及執行緒完成工作，然後等候。The following code example uses the method overload to allow the main thread to signal a blocked thread and then wait until the thread finishes a task. 範例啟動五個執行緒，並讓他們封鎖以建立旗標，然後再發行每一個執行緒時間，使用者按下 ENTER 鍵。The example starts five threads and allows them to block on an created with the flag, then releases one thread each time the user presses the ENTER key. 此範例會排入佇列，另一個的五個執行緒，並釋放所有使用以建立旗標。The example then queues another five threads and releases them all using an created with the flag. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果具名同步處理事件不存在，這個方法不會建立它。If the named synchronization event does not exist, this method does not create it. 若要建立的系統事件不存在時，使用其中一種建構函式具有`name`參數。To create the system event when it does not already exist, use one of the constructors that has a `name` parameter. 如果您不確定具名同步處理事件是否存在，請使用這個方法多載，而不是方法多載，如果同步處理事件不存在，擲回例外狀況。If you are uncertain whether a named synchronization event exists, use this method overload instead of the method overload, which throws an exception if the synchronization event does not exist. 這個方法多載就相當於呼叫方法多載，並指定和權限，使用位元 OR 運算結合。This method overload is equivalent to calling the method overload and specifying and rights, combined by using the bitwise OR operation. 指定旗標可讓執行緒等候該具名的系統事件，並指定旗標可讓呼叫執行緒和方法。Specifying the flag allows a thread to wait on the named system event, and specifying the flag allows a thread to call the and methods. 使用相同的值，這個方法的多次呼叫`name`不一定會傳回相同物件，即使傳回的物件代表相同的具名的系統事件。Multiple calls to this method that use the same value for `name` do not necessarily return the same object, even though the objects that are returned represent the same named system event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果具名同步處理事件不存在，這個方法不會建立它。If the named synchronization event does not exist, this method does not create it. 若要建立的系統事件不存在時，使用其中一種建構函式具有`name`參數。To create the system event when it does not already exist, use one of the constructors that has a `name` parameter. 如果您不確定具名同步處理事件是否存在，請使用這個方法多載，而不是方法多載，如果同步處理事件不存在，擲回例外狀況。If you are uncertain whether a named synchronization event exists, use this method overload instead of the method overload, which throws an exception if the synchronization event does not exist. `rights`參數必須包含旗標以允許的執行緒等待事件，而旗標以允許呼叫的執行緒和方法。The `rights` parameter must include the flag to allow threads to wait on the event, and the flag to allow threads to call the and methods. 使用相同的值，這個方法的多次呼叫`name`不一定會傳回相同物件，即使傳回的物件代表相同的具名的系統事件。Multiple calls to this method that use the same value for `name` do not necessarily return the same object, even though the objects that are returned represent the same named system event.

span.span: is an empty string.
-or- is longer than 260 characters.
is .
A Win32 error occurred.

exception.span: The named event exists, but the user does not have the desired security access.

span.span: The named event exists, but the user does not have the desired security access.

permission.span: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
